id: resync

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Resync"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/resync"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Resynchronize wallet data with the blockchain. Can optionally delete coins, assets, files, offers, addresses, or blocks.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Request parameters for the resync endpoint","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Resynchronize wallet data with the blockchain","required":["fingerprint"],"properties":{"delete_addresses":{"type":"boolean","description":"Delete all address records during resync","default":false},"delete_assets":{"type":"boolean","description":"Delete all asset records during resync","default":false},"delete_blocks":{"type":"boolean","description":"Delete all block records during resync","default":false},"delete_coins":{"type":"boolean","description":"Delete all coin records during resync","default":false},"delete_files":{"type":"boolean","description":"Delete all file records during resync","default":false},"delete_offers":{"type":"boolean","description":"Delete all offer records during resync","default":false},"fingerprint":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","description":"The fingerprint of the wallet to resync","example":1234567890,"minimum":0}},"title":"Resync"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful response from resync","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Response from resynchronizing the wallet","title":"ResyncResponse"}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad request - invalid parameters or malformed JSON"},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized - no wallet is currently logged in, or authentication is required"},"404":{"description":"Not found - requested resource doesn't exist (e.g., NFT, offer, transaction)"},"500":{"description":"Internal server error - unexpected failure in wallet operations"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
